events.message: I am filing a claim for a car accident that happened yesterday involving my vehicle rear-ending another car at a stoplight.
The filed claim has been categorized as an Auto Accident case based on the reported collision details and vehicle damage.
An insurance agent specializing in vehicle claims has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim efficiently.
Your claim concerning the recent car collision has been acknowledged. We have started processing your case promptly.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police accident report, and your driverâ€™s license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including accident photos and police reports have been submitted successfully for your auto accident claim.
Our investigation team has started reviewing all submitted evidence and reports related to your vehicle collision claim.
The investigation into your recent car accident claim is now complete. Findings have been documented for review.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on repair estimates and damage assessments made during investigation.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement offer and your satisfaction with the claims process thus far.
Your auto accident claim has been approved officially, and the agreed settlement amount will be processed shortly.
The compensation payment for your vehicle damage claim has been issued and should reflect in your account within a few days.
Your auto accident claim has been officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
